title: LF Plat 4+ supportmain.

embed.description: Summoner Lookup with statistics, ratings, LoLSkillScore and more for Bronze Fabbbyyy, a League of Legends summoner on the Oceania region.

body:
I just want a support main... thresh/brand/blitz any of these supports would be good.. i like to run an ignite lane.. just someone to play with while i climb through these ranks.

:IGN: Bronze Fabbbyyy

replies.body: Im only gold 5 but I do main support and my main 3 champs are {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:432}} if u ant find any plat people just add me in game, just thought i would give it a go and try find a duo partner :D
